heading.category: CDM (Click on the pie chart to see the patients included in the pie chart)
heading.name: Consider Diabetes
heading.definition: Patients with diabetes dx in 2+ bills or 2+ visit encounters within last 3 years or most recent HbA1C >= 6.5% or Glucose Fasting > 7% or current Insulin (ATC code A10A) or Oral hypoglycemics (ATC code A10B) medication
heading.notes: Created for Doctors of BC i) Diabetes dx in 2+ bills: "Patient Status: Active AND does not have a Current Problem List/Profile item code of 73211009 OR starting with 250 AND with >= 2 Bills with the ICD9 diagnosis code starting with 250 in the last 3 years" ii) Diabetes dx in 2+ visits: "Patient Status: Active AND does not have a Current Problem List/Profile item code of 73211009 OR starting with 250 AND with >= 2 Visit Encounters with Snomed diagnosis code 73211009 or the ICD9 diagnosis code starting with 250 in the last 3 years" iii) HbA1C >= 6.5% or Glucose Fasting > 7% or current Insulin (ATC code A10A) or Oral hypoglycemics (ATC code A10B) medication: "Patient Status: Active AND does not have a Current Problem List/Profile item code of 73211009 OR starting with 250 AND ( (WITH a most recent [HbA1c >= 6.5% OR (>= 0.065 AND NOT > 1)] OR [Fasting Glucose > 7%] in the past 1 year) OR (with two or more HbA1c >= 6.5% in last 5 years) OR (current medication with ATC code starting with A10A or A10B) )"

indicatorQuery.query: SELECT IF ( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( CASE WHEN (fin.dx IS NULL AND fin.billcount >= ${numOfBills}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) , 0) AS "Number with Diabetes dx in ${numOfBills}+ bills", IF ( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( CASE WHEN (fin.dx IS NULL AND fin.visitcount >= ${numOfVisits}) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) , 0) AS "Number with Diabetes dx in ${numOfVisits}+ visits", IF ( COUNT(fin.patient) > 0, SUM( CASE WHEN (fin.dx IS NULL AND (fin.result1 > ${obs1Result} OR (fin.result1 > 0.01*${obs1Result} AND fin.result1 < 1) OR fin.result2 > ${obs2Result} OR fin.cntResult1 >= ${numOfObs} OR fin.medcount >= ${numOfMeds}) ) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) , 0) AS "Number with Diabetes Obs/Medication" FROM ( SELECT d.demographic_no AS patient, BILLING.billcount AS billcount, VISIT.visitcount AS visitcount, OBS1LAST.result AS result1, OBS2LAST.result AS result2, OBS1CNT.countOBS AS cntResult1, MEDS.numOfMeds AS medcount, dxr.dxresearch_code AS dx, dxr.coding_system AS dxs FROM demographic d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT demographic_no, dxresearch_code, coding_system, COUNT(dxresearch_code) FROM dxresearch WHERE status='A' AND ( (LEFT(dxresearch_code, 3) IN ('250') AND coding_system = ${dxcodesSysICD}) OR (dxresearch_code IN ('73211009') AND coding_system LIKE ${dxcodesSysSnoMed}) ) GROUP BY demographic_no ORDER BY demographic_no ) dxr ON d.demographic_no = dxr.demographic_no -- Billed 250 in last 3 years LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b.demographic_no AS demographic_no, b.dx_code1 AS dxcode1, b.dx_code2 AS dxcode2, b.dx_code3 AS dxcode3, COUNT(b.demographic_no) AS billcount FROM billingmaster b WHERE ( LEFT(b.dx_code1, 3) IN ('250') OR LEFT(b.dx_code2, 3) IN ('250') OR LEFT(b.dx_code3, 3) IN ('250') ) AND DATE(b.createdate) > ${lowerLimit.billingdate} AND b.demographic_no > 0 GROUP BY b.demographic_no HAVING COUNT(b.demographic_no) > -1 ) BILLING ON (d.demographic_no = BILLING.demographic_no) -- Coded dx during visit encounter in last 3 years LEFT JOIN( SELECT ASSIGNED.demographic_no AS demographic_no, observation_date AS visitdate, uuid, COUNT(ASSIGNED.demographic_no) AS visitcount FROM casemgmt_note note INNER JOIN ( SELECT note_id, CODED.demo_no AS demographic_no FROM casemgmt_issue_notes INNER JOIN ( SELECT ci.id AS id, ci.update_date, ci.demographic_no demo_no FROM issue i INNER JOIN casemgmt_issue ci ON i.issue_id = ci.issue_id WHERE (i.type LIKE ${dxcodesSysICD} AND LEFT(i.code, 3) IN ('250')) OR (i.type LIKE ${dxcodesSysSnoMed} AND i.code IN ('73211009')) ) CODED ON (casemgmt_issue_notes.id = CODED.id) ORDER BY CODED.demo_no ) ASSIGNED ON note.note_id = ASSIGNED.note_id AND -- GET LAST REVISION OF NOTE note.note_id= (SELECT MAX(cmn.note_id) FROM casemgmt_note cmn WHERE cmn.uuid = note.uuid) AND DATE(note.observation_date) > ${lowerLimit.visitdate} GROUP BY demographic_no ORDER BY demographic_no ) VISIT ON (d.demographic_no = VISIT.demographic_no) -- HbA1C measurement LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m.demographicNo AS demographic_no, m.dataField AS result, m.dateObserved AS dateObserved FROM measurements m INNER JOIN ( SELECT demographicNo, MAX(dateObserved) AS dateObserved FROM measurements WHERE type = ${obs1Name} GROUP BY demographicNo ) mlast ON m.demographicNo = mlast.demographicNo WHERE m.type = ${obs1Name} AND m.dateObserved = mlast.dateObserved AND DATE(m.dateObserved) > ${lowerLimit.labdatelast} AND m.demographicNo > 0 ) OBS1LAST ON (d.demographic_no = OBS1LAST.demographic_no) -- Fasting Glucose measurement LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m.demographicNo AS demographic_no, m.dataField AS result, m.dateObserved AS dateObserved FROM measurements m INNER JOIN ( SELECT demographicNo, MAX(dateObserved) AS dateObserved FROM measurements WHERE type = ${obs2Name} GROUP BY demographicNo ) mlast ON m.demographicNo = mlast.demographicNo WHERE m.type = ${obs2Name} AND m.dateObserved = mlast.dateObserved AND DATE(m.dateObserved) > ${lowerLimit.labdatelast} AND m.demographicNo > 0 ) OBS2LAST ON (d.demographic_no = OBS2LAST.demographic_no) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m.demographicNo AS demographic_no, m.dataField, COUNT(m.dataField) AS countOBS FROM measurements m WHERE m.type = ${obs1Name} AND m.dataField >= ${obs1Result} AND DATE(m.dateObserved) > ${lowerLimit.labdateObs} AND m.demographicNo > 0 GROUP BY m.demographicNo HAVING COUNT(m.demographicNo) > -1 ) OBS1CNT ON (d.demographic_no = OBS1CNT.demographic_no) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT dr.demographic_no, COUNT(DISTINCT dr.atc) AS numOfMeds FROM drugs AS dr -- WHERE dr.archived = 0 AND LEFT(dr.ATC,4) IN ${drugs} WHERE dr.archived = 0 AND dr.ATC LIKE 'A10%' AND (dr.long_term OR (dr.rx_date <= NOW() AND (DATE_ADD(dr.rx_date, INTERVAL(DATEDIFF(dr.end_date,dr.rx_date)*1.0) DAY)) >= NOW())) GROUP BY dr.demographic_no ) MEDS ON (d.demographic_no = MEDS.demographic_no) WHERE d.patient_status LIKE ${active} AND d.demographic_no > 0 AND d.provider_no LIKE '${provider}' AND d.demographic_no NOT IN ${excludedPatient} ) fin

drillDownQuery.query: SELECT * FROM demographic d LEFT JOIN ( SELECT demographic_no, dxresearch_code, coding_system, COUNT(dxresearch_code) FROM dxresearch WHERE status='A' AND ( (LEFT(dxresearch_code, 3) IN ('250') AND coding_system = ${dxcodesSysICD}) OR (dxresearch_code IN ('73211009') AND coding_system LIKE ${dxcodesSysSnoMed}) ) GROUP BY demographic_no ORDER BY demographic_no ) dxr ON d.demographic_no = dxr.demographic_no -- Billed 250 in last 3 years LEFT JOIN ( SELECT b.demographic_no AS demographic_no, b.dx_code1 AS dxcode1, b.dx_code2 AS dxcode2, b.dx_code3 AS dxcode3, COUNT(b.demographic_no) AS billcount FROM billingmaster b WHERE ( LEFT(b.dx_code1, 3) IN ('250') OR LEFT(b.dx_code2, 3) IN ('250') OR LEFT(b.dx_code3, 3) IN ('250') ) AND DATE(b.createdate) > ${lowerLimit.billingdate} AND b.demographic_no > 0 GROUP BY b.demographic_no HAVING COUNT(b.demographic_no) > -1 ) BILLING ON (d.demographic_no = BILLING.demographic_no) -- Coded dx during visit encounter in last 3 years LEFT JOIN( SELECT ASSIGNED.demographic_no AS demographic_no, observation_date AS visitdate, uuid, COUNT(ASSIGNED.demographic_no) AS visitcount FROM casemgmt_note note INNER JOIN ( SELECT note_id, CODED.demo_no AS demographic_no FROM casemgmt_issue_notes INNER JOIN ( SELECT ci.id AS id, ci.update_date, ci.demographic_no demo_no FROM issue i INNER JOIN casemgmt_issue ci ON i.issue_id = ci.issue_id WHERE (i.type LIKE ${dxcodesSysICD} AND LEFT(i.code, 3) IN ('250')) OR (i.type LIKE ${dxcodesSysSnoMed} AND i.code IN ('73211009')) ) CODED ON (casemgmt_issue_notes.id = CODED.id) ORDER BY CODED.demo_no ) ASSIGNED ON note.note_id = ASSIGNED.note_id AND -- GET LAST REVISION OF NOTE note.note_id= (SELECT MAX(cmn.note_id) FROM casemgmt_note cmn WHERE cmn.uuid = note.uuid) AND DATE(note.observation_date) > ${lowerLimit.visitdate} GROUP BY demographic_no ORDER BY demographic_no ) VISIT ON (d.demographic_no = VISIT.demographic_no) -- HbA1C measurement LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m.demographicNo AS demographic_no, m.dataField AS result, m.dateObserved AS dateObserved FROM measurements m INNER JOIN ( SELECT demographicNo, MAX(dateObserved) AS dateObserved FROM measurements WHERE type = ${obs1Name} GROUP BY demographicNo ) mlast ON m.demographicNo = mlast.demographicNo WHERE m.type = ${obs1Name} AND m.dateObserved = mlast.dateObserved AND DATE(m.dateObserved) > ${lowerLimit.labdatelast} AND m.demographicNo > 0 ) OBS1LAST ON (d.demographic_no = OBS1LAST.demographic_no) -- Fasting Glucose measurement LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m.demographicNo AS demographic_no, m.dataField AS result, m.dateObserved AS dateObserved FROM measurements m INNER JOIN ( SELECT demographicNo, MAX(dateObserved) AS dateObserved FROM measurements WHERE type = ${obs2Name} GROUP BY demographicNo ) mlast ON m.demographicNo = mlast.demographicNo WHERE m.type = ${obs2Name} AND m.dateObserved = mlast.dateObserved AND DATE(m.dateObserved) > ${lowerLimit.labdatelast} AND m.demographicNo > 0 ) OBS2LAST ON (d.demographic_no = OBS2LAST.demographic_no) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT m.demographicNo AS demographic_no, m.dataField, COUNT(m.dataField) AS countOBS FROM measurements m WHERE m.type = ${obs1Name} AND m.dataField >= ${obs1Result} AND DATE(m.dateObserved) > ${lowerLimit.labdateObs} AND m.demographicNo > 0 GROUP BY m.demographicNo HAVING COUNT(m.demographicNo) > -1 ) OBS1CNT ON (d.demographic_no = OBS1CNT.demographic_no) LEFT JOIN ( SELECT dr.demographic_no, COUNT(DISTINCT dr.atc) AS numOfMeds FROM drugs AS dr -- WHERE dr.archived = 0 AND LEFT(dr.ATC,4) IN ${drugs} WHERE dr.archived = 0 AND dr.ATC LIKE 'A10%' AND (dr.long_term OR (dr.rx_date <= NOW() AND (DATE_ADD(dr.rx_date, INTERVAL(DATEDIFF(dr.end_date,dr.rx_date)*1.0) DAY)) >= NOW())) GROUP BY dr.demographic_no ) MEDS ON (d.demographic_no = MEDS.demographic_no) WHERE d.patient_status LIKE ${active} AND d.demographic_no > 0 AND ( dxr.dxresearch_code IS NULL AND ( (BILLING.billcount IS NOT NULL AND BILLING.billcount >= ${numOfBills}) OR (VISIT.visitcount IS NOT NULL AND VISIT.visitcount >= ${numOfVisits}) OR ( (OBS1LAST.result IS NOT NULL AND (OBS1LAST.result > ${obs1Result} OR (OBS1LAST.result > 0.01*${obs1Result} AND OBS1LAST.result < 1))) OR (OBS2LAST.result IS NOT NULL AND OBS2LAST.result > ${obs2Result} ) OR (OBS1CNT.countOBS IS NOT NULL AND OBS1CNT.countOBS >= ${numOfObs}) OR (MEDS.numOfMeds IS NOT NULL AND MEDS.numOfMeds >= ${numOfMeds}) ) ) ) AND d.provider_no LIKE '${provider}' AND d.demographic_no NOT IN ${excludedPatient} ORDER BY d.demographic_no
